basicInfo.name: Aquila
basicInfo.flavor: Aquila is the last half-demon in the Holy Cross Crusaders and taught most of its members. She escaped Bai Jiao's trap with the help of the Night Crows, but went into hibernation from her injuries.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 50% of Physical Attack plus 12% of the caster's Max HP 1 time(s).
 - Ally with Lowest Current HP (Excluding Self)
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 8% of the caster's Max HP. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 60% of Physical Attack plus 14% of the caster's Max HP.
 - Ally with Lowest Current HP (Excluding Self)
 - Adds Effect: Grants a Barrier equal to 8% of the caster's Max HP. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]

Skill 1.name: Merciless Storm
Skill 1.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 15% of Physical Attack plus 4% of the caster's Max HP 2 time(s).
 - 60% chance Death Turn Reduction becomes 1 turn(s) during each attack.
 - 100% chance to inflict Weakness Hit Chance Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Chance: Death Turn Reduction chance becomes 70%.
 - Increases Effect: Weakness Hit Chance Reduction to 30%.

Skill 2.name: Shroud of Darkness
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 35% of Physical Attack plus 9% of the caster's Max HP 1 time(s).
 - 35% chance to inflict Death. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - All Allies
 - Grants Link. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Chance: Death chance becomes 40%.
 - Adds Effect: Link reduction rate of 10%.

Passive.name: Shepherd of Darkness
Passive.desc:
All Enemies
 - Inflicts Effect Resist Reduction. [Always Active]
 - Self
 - Heals HP equal to 34% of the caster's Max HP when HP falls to 50% or lower. [1 Time(s) per Battle]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Effect Resist Reduction to 34%.
超越2段階達成効果
 - Increases Stacks: Heals HP more times per battle. [2 Time(s) per Battle]
超越6段階達成効果
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: 10s Skill Cooldown Reduction when an enemy falls in battle.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Karl Heron, the Holy Cross Crusaders, the Night Crows, roasted almonds, order, hell's weed
profile.dislikes: Bai Jiao, Dellons, stew, chaos, demons
profile.story: Aquila is the last half-demon in the Holy Cross Crusaders and taught most of its members. She escaped Bai Jiao's trap with the help of the Night Crows, but went into hibernation from her injuries.

basicInfo.name: Aquila
basicInfo.subname: Commander of the Holy Cross Crusaders
basicInfo.flavor: After her final battle, burdened by the guilt of not being able to protect everyone, Aquila vowed to exterminate all demons. Together with other half-demons, she formed the first Holy Cross Crusaders and took her place as their commander.

Single Enemy

スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 45% of Physical Attack.

 - 60% chance Death Turn Reduction becomes 1 turn(s) during each attack.
 - 100% chance to inflict Weakness Hit Chance Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 13% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 35% of Physical Attack plus 8% of the caster's Max HP 1 time(s).
 - 35% chance to inflict Death. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - All Allies

All Enemies

basicInfo.name: Aquila
basicInfo.flavor: Born half elf and half demon, Aquila led the human alliance in the war against demons. Fighting in the front lines, she was the Goddess of Victory for humans. To demons, she was a brutal slayer.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 40% of Physical Attack plus 10% of the caster's Max HP 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果

 - 60% chance Death Turn Reduction becomes 1 turn(s) during each attack.
 - 100% chance to inflict Weakness Hit Chance Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 12% of Physical Attack.

3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 30% of Physical Attack plus 7% of the caster's Max HP 1 time(s).
 - 30% chance to inflict Death. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - All Allies

スキル強化効果
